This lab contains a SQL injection vulnerability in its stock check feature. The results from the query are returned in the applicationâ€™s response, so you can use a UNION attack to retrieve data from other tables.
The database contains a users table, which contains the usernames and passwords of registered users. To solve the lab, perform a SQL injection attack to retrieve the admin use...

entry.title: Visible error-based SQL injection
entry.summary:
ðŸ”¬ LAB:
This lab contains a SQL injection vulnerability. The application uses a tracking cookie for analytics, and performs a SQL query containing the value of the submitted cookie. The results of the SQL query are not returned.
The database contains a different table called users, with columns called username and password. To solve the lab, find a way to leak the password for the administrato...

entry.title: RPI Zero W E: You don't have enough free space in /var/cache/apt/archives/. [Solved]

link.title: RPI Zero W E: You don't have enough free space in /var/cache/apt/archives/. [Solved]

entry.summary:
RPI Zero W E: You donâ€™t have enough free space in /var/cache/apt/archives/. [Solved]
This error message showed up on a raspberry pi zero-w with a fresh install of Raspbian or others OS-related.
Error Msg.
You don't have enough free space in /var/cache/apt/archives/.
Solution by the command line
raspi-config --expand-rootfs
Hi there ðŸ‘‹ Support me!
